name: WWF Attitude
overview: WWF Attitude from Acclaim is the ultimate in wrestling titles for the Dreamcast. Just like its PSX counterpart, the Dreamcast version allows the ultimate wrestling fan to have a plethora of options to choose from to suit his particular wrestling mood. The 128-bit experience is, in itself, amazing. Team that up with good gameplay and a multitude of options makes WWF Attitude for the DC a forerunner in the wrestling ring!
